hero.name: Musa Alioğlu
hero.description: I am a Frontend Developer with 3 years of professional experience in the software industry. I specialize in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Frontend Developer with 3 years of professional experience in the software industry. I specialize in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. Throughout my career, I have worked with tools and frameworks including HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, MUI, shadcn/ui, and Inertia.js with Laravel.
about.focus: I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and creating seamless user experiences. I actively follow UI/UX trends and continuously improve my skills to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in frontend technologies.
about.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

parolapara.description: Contributed to the development of multiple internal and customer-facing applications, focusing on clean design and performance.
tasks: Developed and maintained landing pages, web wallet, admin panel, and fraud detection panel.
Built responsive UIs using React, TypeScript (TSX/JSX), TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui.
Utilized Redux and Thunk for advanced state management across modules.
Collaborated with backend teams to ensure seamless API integration and data flow.

argedor.description: Worked on innovative projects involving blockchain and AI technologies, contributing to user-facing interfaces and component architecture.
tasks: Played a key role in the Hippist project, an AI-based platform that was selected for the Türkiye İş Bankası Cohort and received an award.
Built reusable components and complex UI workflows using React, TSX, Bootstrap, and Redux.
Ensured accessibility and cross-browser compatibility across all supported devices.

llcsoft.description: Participated in the development of a warehouse management system, delivering intuitive and efficient front-end screens.
tasks: Focused on the design and implementation of dashboard views, forms, and real-time UI updates.
Collaborated in sprint-based development with backend and QA teams.

shmarine.description: Worked on design and implementation of electronic control systems for marine applications.
tasks: Assisted in prototyping, circuit design, and documentation.
Took initiative in developing internal digital tools, sparking transition into software development.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Management System
warehouse.description: Internal enterprise tool designed for inventory and warehouse tracking. Implemented dashboard views, forms, and dynamic tables to improve logistics visibility.

hippist.title: Hippist
hippist.description: An AI-powered platform that provides personalized travel and lifestyle suggestions. Project was accepted into the Türkiye İş Bankası Cohort and received recognition for innovation.

landing.title: Landing Pages
landing.description: Created modern and conversion-focused landing pages for the company's public-facing platforms. Ensured mobile responsiveness, fast load times, and SEO-friendly design.

wallet.title: Web Wallet
wallet.description: A secure web wallet for managing user funds and transactions. Implemented responsive wallet UI, transaction flows, and real-time balance updates.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: Internal dashboard for platform administration and user management. Built admin interfaces for user/transaction management, role-based access, and analytics views.

fraud.title: Fraud Detection Panel
fraud.description: A dedicated interface for detecting, investigating, and managing fraudulent activities. Developed interactive dashboards and investigation tools to flag suspicious transactions and user behavior.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me for new opportunities and collaborations.

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui.
